Subject: DIRAC Server Installation
Case Description: I'm trying to install the DIRAC server. I see that I need a 'Quantis USB device' for generating random numbers. Is this device absolutely required, or can the system work without it? If I don't have one available right now, can I still complete the installation and get the DIRAC server running?

Subject: NUSA-2 unit not available(slot-6) / no application software alarm
Case Description: Site 17B NUSA2 unit slot 6 is reporting 'No Application Software' alarm and customer has reported Ethernet traffic using 'EOS' for both unit 4 & 6 is down.

Subject: NE OSPF Remote Management Failure
Case Description: Customer reported a specific FOX615 NE (as named as EMG) within their network has lost management communication. All services carried by it are working normally, though. The remote management is done by DCN in-band communication via MCC interfaces over the main MPLS-TP ring and via ECC PDH for standalone SDH connections, both using the internal OSPF router, as described in the attached topology document. Between SDH FOX615 devices and EMG hybrid FOX615 device are radio third party links, so they are not connected directly. EMG is the uplink of the remote management of standalone SDH FOX615 towards the main ring and then to the control center. After accessing the equipment through local console interface, it was possible to notice the lo-1 interface is operationally down (unknown reason so far), so OSPF is not working properly. We have tried to restart OSPF and switchover the CESM3 redundant control units, both unsucceeded.
